DOC.brief_summary: Allogenic differentiate adipocytes ( ANT-adip-AL ) produce well-established technique include cell harvest lipoaspirates obtain healthy donor , expansion adipose tissue derive stem cell , differentiation pure immature adipocytes . This open-label study . Subjects receive subcutaneous injection ANT-adip-AL follow 8 week accord clinical trial protocol .
